25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Umar ibn al-Khattab: Umar said while he was (sitting) on the pulpit: O people, the opinion from the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was right, because Allah showed (i.e. inspired) him; but from us it is sheer conjecture and artifice

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي قَضَاءِ الْقَاضِي إِذَا أَخْطَأَ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding the Judges judge when he is mistaken
